title: Chile: hasta cuando?
brief_description: An account of current political unrest in Chile, 12 years after the murder of Allende and the installation of military dictatorship under General Pinochet. This powerful documentary is also about the struggle of the people of Chile. Under the present dictatorship, some 50,000 Chileans have been detained, many are missing believed dead.
